name: DevForge
description: Engineered an AI-powered development environment integrating LLMs with containerized runtimes, automating code generation, execution, and error-correction to enhance developer productivity and code reliability

Developed a web-based IDE with seamless project management and interactive console access, orchestrating communication between Linux filesystem, cloud containers, and AI models for a streamlined end-to-end development workflow

name: MLOps - Credit Card Fraud Detection
description: Architected and implemented a comprehensive end-to-end MLOps pipeline for credit card fraud detection, encompassing robust data ingestion, preprocessing, model training, and production deployment workflows

name: Cropify
description: Developed a full-stack agricultural assistance platform integrating React.js frontend and Flask backend, leveraging ML/DL models to provide personalized crop and fertilizer recommendations based on environmental and location-based data

Implemented real-time plant disease detection using deep learning, with automated diagnosis and treatment recommendations, demonstrating the practical application of computer vision techniques to empower data-driven farming
